org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.validators

Class JDBCScopeValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.validators.OAuth2ScopeValidator
      • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.validators.JDBCScopeValidator

  • public class JDBCScopeValidator
extends OAuth2ScopeValidator
    The JDBC Scope Validation implementation. This validates the Resource's scope (stored in IDN_OAUTH2_RESOURCE_SCOPE) against the Access Token's scopes.

                             String resource)
                      throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Description copied from class: OAuth2ScopeValidator

        Specified by:
        validateScope in class OAuth2ScopeValidator
        Parameters:
        accessTokenDO - - The access token data object
        resource - - The resource that is being accessed.
        Returns:

      • validateScope

        public boolean validateScope(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
                      throws org.wso2.carbon.user.api.UserStoreException,
                             IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Description copied from class: OAuth2ScopeValidator
        Method to validate scopes in the token request against the roles of user
        Overrides:
        validateScope in class OAuth2ScopeValidator
        Returns:

      • getValidatorName

        public String getValidatorName()
        Description copied from class: OAuth2ScopeValidator
        Method to get the name of the implemented scope validator name to display in the UI and save in the database. As default the class name is used.
